alert.note: Alert for Blair (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:38PM EDT until August 12 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN BLAIR COUNTY... At 938 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Royer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Altoona, Hollidaysburg, Roaring Spring, Martinsburg, Lakemont, Williamsburg, Duncansville, Canoe Creek State Park, Royer, East Freedom, Newry and Peoples Natural Gas Field. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 22 to 35. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
